content: chain-3 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in center chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain-4 space single_crochet in next chain-4 space chain 4 ** single_crochet in next chain-4 space repeat from * to last chain space ending at ** single_crochet in last chain-3 space 3 double_crochet chain 2 4 double_crochet in last v-st this pattern is offered for any use - personal charity or sale however you may not alter redistribute or sell the pattern itself for pattern support email corin@iknituknot com check me out @i knit u knot on instagram and show me your creations with #writealineshawl keep on creating
